伱字的基本解释

伱
nǐ
古同“你”。

伱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nǐ］
［《廣韻》乃里切，上止，泥。］
“你1”的古字。
(1)称对方（一个人）。
(2)表示领属关系。等于说你的、你们的。

伱字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　伱； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页96第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?乃里切，泥上聲。汝也。【通雅】爾汝而若乃一聲之轉。爾又爲尔，尔又作伱，俗書作你。

伱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
伱字的起名意思

暂无。

You
Basic explanation of words
You
nǐ
Gu Tong "you".
You
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nǐ］
["Guangyun" is cut, top stop, mud. ]
The ancient word "you 1".
(1) Call the other party (a person).
(2) Represents the affiliation. It's like talking about yours and yours.
You
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伱; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 96 to 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]? No cut, sound on the mud. You too. 【Tongya】Er Ru and Ruo is a turn. You are you, you are you, and popular books are you.
